page.title: 11Harpers Court
page.content: In May 1977 the building was opened as sheltered housing for the elderly. Built on the site of {Jabez Rowell's } fellmongers yard and built of red brick to a modern design it was not greeted with universal approval. It has become a centre of village life. Coffee mornings are held in the large lounge as are concerts and recitals. Local school children visit and entertain. There is also a day centre based here and the elderly of the village are able to visit each week. There are outings by coach and the day centre has a large band of willing supporters to help in any way they can.
